title: Add a restlets to a feature or a restlet
description: Add a restlet to an existing feature or restlet

path.name: path
path.description: Optional parent restlets path to add a restlet to a restlet (to create a subrestlet).Example: contacts/addresses/locations This adds a restlet to the feature [identifier] in the ressource contacts/addresses/locations/

name.name: name
name.description: Name of the restlet.Please use directory directives.

201.description: Restlet created, more information in response body

500.description: Restlet could not be created, maybe the restlet already exist or the system does not have write permissions for the target folder.More information in response body.
